text: I'm a generalist, but a rationalist. I like to think that, in the end, it is all data. In the end, perhaps a more quantified approach to traditionally non-quantitative fields can make us more objectively about them. To that end, I can take that thinking and use it to build products that can tangibly better people's lives.
username: Hi, I'm Santosh. This is my site. Enjoy your stay!
